(2727x1+0)/1 mod 65536 = 2727. (2727x3+1)/2 mod 32768 = 4091. (2727x9+5)/4 mod 16384 = 6137. (2727x27+19)/8 mod 8192 = 1014. (2727x27+19)/16 mod 4096 = 507. (2727x81+73)/32 mod 2048 = 761. (2727x243+251)/64 mod 1024 = 118. (2727x243+251)/128 mod 512 = 59. (2727x729+881)/256 mod 256 = 89. (2727x2187+2899)/512 mod 128 = 6. (2727x2187+2899)/1024 mod 64 = 3. (2727x6561+9721)/2048 mod 32 = 5. (2727x19683+31211)/4096 mod 16 = 8. (2727x19683+31211)/8192 mod 8 = 4. (2727x19683+31211)/16384 mod 4 = 2. (2727x19683+31211)/32768 mod 2 = 1. (2727x59049+126401)/65536 mod 1 = 0.
